articles.title: More dominos to fall after Cotric move to Raiders - NRL.COM
articles.description: Former NSW Origin winger Nick Cotric will return to Canberra after being released by the Bulldogs.
articles.content:
Former NSW Origin winger Nick Cotric will commence training with Canberra this week after being released by Canterbury in a move expected to have a domino effect on the player transfer market.
